name: Oingo
startIntroPart1: Long life Brother Oingo, a plan executor of the Mighty Oingo-Boingo Brothers.
startIntroPart2: O' poor Oingo, times come to you once more to ruin The Stardust Crusaders plans! Will you make Oing-Boingo Brothers can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Time to host a show! And you are a perfect tragedy!
attacked: Do you really know who I am, Fool?
introduction: Hello. I am Oingo, my card is the God of creation Khnum!
afterPeace: Well, no word from lil bro anyway.
tradeRequest: Your goods seems good, why don't we help each other?
uniqueText: Decrease combat strength in enemy land, Increase combat strength in friendly land, Free social policy from Hermitage.
uniques: [-15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when at war> <in [Enemy Land] tiles>
[+10]% Strength <for [All] units> <when at war> <in [Friendly Land] tiles>
